title: No, Phoebe Waller-Bridge Will Not Put Down Her Three Emmys in This SNL Promo
text:
In case you haven’t heard, Phoebe Waller-Bridge looked pretty badass hanging out with her three Emmys after the awards were handed out last week, and as today’s promo for Saturday Night Live reveals, her new friendship with those three golden beauties is far from over. Cast members Chris Redd, Chloe Fineman, and Beck Bennett all show up in the promo to tend to first-time SNL host Waller-Bridge’s and her Emmys’ every need. Come for Bennett pitching a sketch to Waller-Bridge about “bearcuts,” stay for Waller-Bridge snobbishly repeating the demand, “Water. Water. Water” to Redd and Fineman. This is more or less confirmation that Waller-Bridge’s Emmys will make a big cameo during her opening monologue this weekend, right?

Related
description: NBC’s ‘Saturday Night Live’ released the first promo for first-time host Phoebe Waller-Bridge today, which features the three Emmys she just won last week.
